description:
Want to attract more customers in Oughterard and dominate local search results? Kraft Agency delivers Google Ads campaigns that transform clicks into customers and ad spend into revenue. As a leading digital agency serving Oughterard and County Galway, we combine proven PPC strategies with cutting-edge AI optimization to ensure your advertising delivers exceptional returns on investment.

Our approach to Google Ads in Oughterard goes beyond basic campaign setup. We conduct deep market research to understand your local competition, identify high-value keywords that Oughterard customers actually search for, and craft compelling ad copy that drives clicks. Then we build optimized landing pages designed specifically to convert those visitors into paying customers. Every element of your campaign is strategically designed to maximize results while minimizing wasted ad spend.

Working with businesses throughout Oughterard and West Galway, we've helped companies across dozens of industries achieve breakthrough results with Google Ads. From local service providers to tourism businesses leveraging Oughterard's position as the Gateway to Connemara, we tailor our PPC strategies to your unique market position and business goals. With transparent reporting and continuous optimization powered by AI, you'll always know exactly how your campaigns perform and where every euro is invested.

process.title: Free PPC Audit & Consultation
process.description: We analyze your business, target market in Oughterard, and competitive landscape. If you're already running ads, we audit existing campaigns to identify opportunities for improvement and cost savings.

process.title: Strategic Campaign Development
process.description: Our Google Ads specialists develop a comprehensive PPC strategy including keyword research, audience targeting, budget allocation, and ad creation tailored specifically to the Oughterard market and your business goals.

process.title: Landing Page Optimization
process.description: We create or optimize high-converting landing pages with clear calls-to-action, trust signals, and mobile optimization to ensure maximum conversion rates from your Oughterard traffic.

process.title: Campaign Launch & Setup
process.description: Your campaigns go live with comprehensive conversion tracking, call tracking, and analytics integration. We monitor initial performance closely to ensure strong results from day one.

process.title: Continuous AI Optimization
process.description: Using advanced machine learning tools, we continuously analyze performance data and make intelligent optimizations to bidding, targeting, and ad creative to improve ROI week over week.

process.title: Transparent Reporting & Growth
process.description: Receive detailed monthly reports showing all key metrics and ROI. We schedule regular strategy calls to review performance, discuss insights, and plan scaling strategies for continued growth.

pricingInfo: Google Ads management for Oughterard businesses starts from €750 per month for local campaigns (plus your ad spend budget). We recommend minimum monthly ad budgets of €500-€1,000 for effective local reach, with larger budgets for regional or national targeting. Contact us for a free PPC audit and customized proposal.
serviceArea: Oughterard and surrounding areas including Moycullen, Galway City, Clifden, Maam Cross, and all of West Galway and Connemara
availability: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM GMT. Dedicated account manager available for ongoing support.
qualifications: Advanced Google Analytics and conversion tracking certified
guarantees: 100% transparent reporting with full account access

faq.question: How much does Google Ads cost for an Oughterard business?
faq.answer: Total investment includes management fees (typically €750+ per month) plus your ad spend budget. We recommend €500-€1,000 monthly ad spend for local Oughterard campaigns. Tourism and hospitality businesses may benefit from larger budgets of €2,000-€5,000+ during peak season to maximize reach.

faq.question: Can Google Ads help my tourism business in Oughterard?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Oughterard's position as the Gateway to Connemara makes it ideal for tourism-focused Google Ads. We can target visitors searching for accommodation, activities, and services in the area with seasonal campaigns optimized for peak tourist months. Many of our Oughterard clients are in tourism and hospitality.

faq.question: How quickly will I see results from Google Ads?
faq.answer: Your ads can start appearing immediately after launch, generating traffic within hours. However, optimal performance develops over 4-8 weeks as we collect data and refine targeting. Most Oughterard businesses see positive ROI within 2-3 months as campaigns mature.

faq.question: Do you work with businesses outside of Oughterard?
faq.answer: Yes! While we have deep expertise in the Oughterard and Connemara market, we serve businesses throughout County Galway and across Ireland. Our Google Ads strategies work for local, regional, national, and international targeting.

faq.question: What makes your Google Ads service better than doing it myself?
faq.answer: Google Ads looks simple but requires deep expertise to execute profitably. Our specialists bring 15+ years of experience, Google Partner certification, AI-powered optimization tools, and proven strategies that most businesses can't replicate in-house. We typically improve ROI by 50-300% compared to self-managed campaigns.

faq.question: Will I own my Google Ads account?
faq.answer: Yes, you maintain full ownership and access to your Google Ads account at all times. We manage it on your behalf, but you're never locked out. You'll also receive comprehensive monthly reports and have 24/7 access to custom performance dashboards.

faq.question: Can you help with landing page creation for my ads?
faq.answer: Definitely! High-converting landing pages are crucial for Google Ads success. We design and build custom landing pages optimized specifically for your Oughterard campaigns, ensuring message consistency and maximum conversion rates.

faq.question: What if my campaigns aren't performing well?
faq.answer: We continuously monitor and optimize all campaigns. If performance isn't meeting expectations, we quickly diagnose issues and implement solutions. Our AI-powered tools help us identify and fix problems faster than traditional management. We're fully transparent about performance and always working to improve results.
